description: The Jersey Care Commission says protective equipment provision has improved from several weeks ago.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey care homes have 'grave concerns' over PPE
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey care homes have 'grave concerns' over PPE - BBC News
maintext: The commission has been escalating these issues to Health and Community Services on an almost daily basis and had secured a direct line of contact for care homes to inform the government about their needs, she confirmed.
